data.title: Ai2: Truly open breakthrough AI
data.description: Ai2, founded by Paul Allen and led by Ali Farhadi, conducts high-impact research and engineering to tackle key problems in artificial intelligence.
data.content:
Ai2: Truly open breakthrough AI
===============

[Skip to main content -\>](https://allenai.org/#main-content)

[Ai2](https://allenai.org/)Navigation Menu

*   Open technologies
    
    *   [Open models Ai2’s open model collection, including LLMs, multimodal models, and evaluation frameworks.](https://allenai.org/open-models)
    *   [Open data A featured collection of open datasets published by Ai2](https://allenai.org/open-data)
    *   [AI for the environment Real environmental impact through empowering conservation efforts](https://allenai.org/ai-for-the-environment)
    *   [AI for science Developing tools to help accelerate scientific breakthroughs](https://allenai.org/ai-for-science)
    *   [On-device Explore Ai2's fully open models that can run entirely on-device](https://allenai.org/on-device)
    
*   Research
    
    *   [Research principles The five core principles that all of Ai2’s researchers follow](https://allenai.org/research-principles)
    *   [Papers A collection of research papers published by Ai2](https://allenai.org/papers)
    *   [Foundations of AI The influential foundational research our team undertakes in frontier areas of AI](https://allenai.org/foundations-of-ai)
    
*   [About Us](https://allenai.org/about)
*   [Blog](https://allenai.org/blog)
*   [Playground](https://playground.allenai.org/)

Fully open source, running entirely on‑device.
==============================================

Fully open source, running entirely on‑device.
----------------------------------------------

[Find out more](https://allenai.org/on-device)

![Image 1](blob:https://allenai.org/83afa2936887d65830242f75d3d389dc)![Image 2](blob:https://allenai.org/a74f11d08768569b4ea0f6d3323fe403)![Image 3: A computer generated image showing swaths of shapes, meant to depict a hopeful futuristic feeling.](https://www.datocms-assets.com/64837/1721916464-gettyimages-1496986835.jpg?fit=fill&h=639&w=705)

Meet OLMo, your open LLM
------------------------

We use our open-first approach to empower researchers and developers like you to advance the science of language models and use them in new and exciting ways.

[Try OLMo](https://allenai.org/olmo)

![Image 5](blob:https://allenai.org/72a61055d1e35f381c8bd597bafbc2f1)![Image 6](blob:https://allenai.org/552f27790c99a9d7f8b90ee4826ea12f)![Image 7: Two Ai2 team members standing looking at a laptop one of them is holding, smiling.](https://www.datocms-assets.com/64837/1722283035-luca-and-kyle-with-laptop.jpg?fit=fill&h=639&w=705)

Research is in our DNA
----------------------

Our research is guided by a strong set of open, collaborative, and inclusive principles that are designed to create safe, ethical, and trustworthy AI systems and resources.

[Dive deeper](https://allenai.org/research-principles)

![Image 9](blob:https://allenai.org/cb4864c1a5888c5f0a55da419cf42a6c)![Image 10](blob:https://allenai.org/e7a2c68d532277d9ea4eca5c4be7e8e3)

All the updates
---------------

Get the lowdown on recent model developments, the launch of new datasets, the latest in AI policy, and so much more on our blog—your hub for all things Ai2.

[Start reading](https://blog.allenai.org/)

![Image 12](blob:https://allenai.org/83afa2936887d65830242f75d3d389dc)![Image 13](blob:https://allenai.org/5e01466c51cb7290082b92bddb291824)

Open data - Dig into the data
-----------------------------

Because we believe in true openness, we make our datasets available via Hugging Face so that you can experiment with and use them to train AI models.

[Browse datasets](https://allenai.org/open-data)

![Image 15](blob:https://allenai.org/5babe3438db7b24c31e1664028d5baa1)![Image 16](blob:https://allenai.org/32eeb180d6d084197f80bcc2ac9db5a3)

AI for the environment - All eyes on impact
-------------------------------------------

When we say we want to make the world a better place, we mean it. Whether we’re advancing climate science or empowering conservationists to protect wildlife, we deliver the environmental AI research that matters.

[Explore projects](https://allenai.org/ai-for-the-environment)

Our partners
------------

Deep collaboration is the only way to build advanced, open AI. We partner closely with a wide range of external organizations to deliver breakthrough moments.

![Image 18](blob:https://allenai.org/457641594465c21545aee0a650a0e546)![Image 19](blob:https://allenai.org/5565da84002cd9712fd1a4dfad11281f)

### Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation

We’re working with the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation to help increase public understanding of AI and lay the groundwork for the Digital Holistic Student Supports AI Tools & Enablers development.

[Visit Gates Foundation](https://www.gatesfoundation.org/)

![Image 21](blob:https://allenai.org/29379aaeaa605e3ff4d1a3ae01c7eb75)![Image 22](blob:https://allenai.org/6a7cdbeeaa23901ee09e9f0a1d00381a)

### University of Washington

We partner with the UW's Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science & Engineering on a wide variety of our foundational and applied research, amplifying our impact and supporting the next generation of AI researchers and developers.

[Visit the Allen School](https://www.cs.washington.edu/)

![Image 24](blob:https://allenai.org/83afa2936887d65830242f75d3d389dc)![Image 25](blob:https://allenai.org/ca13111d4d61ed5523a0c3dc46031fbe)

### The National Artificial Intelligence Research Resource (NAIRR)

We’re proud to commit to the NAIRR Pilot by providing access to a truly open ecosystem of data, models, training, and evaluation software needed to support a scientific approach to AI research.

[Visit NAIRR](https://nairrpilot.org/)

Careers - Join us
-----------------

Internship opportunities, cutting-edge research programs, and exciting new jobs. There are a whole host of ways for you to get involved at Ai2.

![Image 27](blob:https://allenai.org/9881e71db978c6780708a5dfcd1460c8)![Image 28](blob:https://allenai.org/b22fb0026b81b6b02a2807f73c018d96)

Current jobs

[View open roles](https://allenai.org/careers)

![Image 30](blob:https://allenai.org/9881e71db978c6780708a5dfcd1460c8)![Image 31](blob:https://allenai.org/591d396c9fb5dfa43e5c99a01682bd07)

Internships

[Explore internships](https://allenai.org/internships)
